title.narrative: Promoting the application of international standards of business integrity in Vietnam

description.narrative: The project is designed to promote the application of international business integrity standards to business associations and groups of businesses in Vietnam through the support for anti-corruption solutions and engagement with public and private stakeholders drawing on Transparency International's experience in promoting business collective action in other ASEAN countries, in order to help improve the business environment, including for international businesses in Vietnam.
